name: Beam Team
description:
A frantic, 2-player, couch co-op game revolving around planets, teamwork, and destruction.

THE BEAM TEAM:

You and your team are interstellar diplomats from the planet Yoofo, and you've just received your latest orders: find and destroy the other planets in this quadrant of the galaxy.

At least... you're pretty sure that's what they said; the signal gets spotty out here. It's an unusual mission for your department, but hey, diplomats are nothing if not adaptable.

THE CURRENT STATE OF THE GAME:

Beam Team is currently under development. Get ready to explore strange new worlds, seek out new life, and new civilisations.* To boldly go where - wait, no. Wrong space drama.

*new levels and playable characters

FEEDBACK:

We welcome all feedback so that we can shape the game towards a more enjoyable experience. Please feel free to reach out :)


Controls

Xbox Controllers : A - shoot | B- Beam | Left and Right analog stick

Keyboard: Not Recommended

Player1 : T - Shoot | Y - Beam | A and D 

Player2 : < - Shoot | > - Beam | Left and Right 

P - Quick Restart
